content.raw:
I believe so. `nm libsdformat.so` shows

```
00000000000c3a32 T cmdCheck                                                                                                                                                                
00000000000c3d47 T ignitionVersion                                                                                                                                                            
00000000000c3d59 T cmdDescribe                                                                                                                                                                 
00000000000c3e74 T cmdPrint
```

but I don't believe adding the namespace helps with that.
